message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $180. I believe it's a fantastic deal and worth every penny. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $150 for it. Would you be willing to adjust your price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest.  While $180 represents a fair price, I'm willing to come down to $165. I believe this is a very reasonable compromise. What do you say?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $155 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle for both of us.
